entry.title: About Me
entry.summary: Passionate about coding and an undergraduate in computer science from Baihata Chariali, Assam. I am dedicated to continuously improving my skills and delivering exceptional web development projects. Experienced in creating websites and chatbots, I focus on mastering new technologies to develop innovative solutions. I enjoy playing carrom and chess, which enhance my strategic thinking skills.
entry.content:
About Me

Kunal Kongkan Kashyap

Developer and computer science enthusiast from Baihata Chariali, Assam. I am focused on honing my skills and delivering high-quality web development projects.

Besides technical pursuits, I enjoy carrom and chess, which provide a refreshing break and hone my strategic thinking abilities.

Education

  • Gauhati University: Integrated MSc in Computer Science
  • Gateway Senior Secondary School: Class 12, Science
  • Adarsha Jatiya Vidyalaya, Bihdia: Class 10

Main Skills

  • Languages: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, SQL
  • Frameworks: Express.js, React.js
  • Runtime: Node.js
  • CSS Frameworks: Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap
  • Databases: MongoDB, MySQL
  • Version Control: Git, GitHub
  • DevOps: Docker

✨ “The best way to predict the future is to create it.”
